dmca.title: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Ashley Wright [mailto:Ashley.Wright@thackraywilliams.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 21, 2005 8:53 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement



<<ThePlanetcom 13th June 2005.doc>> 
Sent by fax TWICE now. 

Please reply, even if only to let me know that not enough info has been
provided. 




Confidentiality: This email is confidential and may be legally privileged.
If you are not the intended recipient, then you must not copy it, forward
it, disclose it to another person, nor use it for any purpose. Instead,
please return it to the sender immediately. Please then delete your copy
from your system.
Viruses: Although Thackray Williams operates anti-virus programmes, we do
not accept responsibility for viruses or any damage whatsoever that is
caused by viruses being inadvertently passed.
Business Use: Any views or opinions expressed in this message (and any
attachments) that do not relate to the official business of Thackray
Williams are neither given nor endorsed by it.

Thackray Williams, Solicitors

Head Office
Kings House
32-40 Widmore Road
Bromley
Kent BR1 1RY

Tel: 020 8290 0440 Fax: 020 8464 5282

http://www.thackraywilliams.com

Branch offices in Beckenham, Bromley High Street, Chislehurst & West
Wickham.

This firm does not accept service of documents by e-mail.

Authorised and regulated by the Financial Services Authority.  Regulated by
the Law Society.        

13th June 2005



George Poletes
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas TX 75207








Our Ref:  
Your Ref: 


Dear Mr Poletes

Re:  Notification of Claimed Infringement

I am writing to you as specified in ThePlanet.com Copyright Notifications web page as a website hosted by ThePlanet.com has taken text and pictures from our website and is using it on their website.

The website that has copied the material is: http://www.andrewspencerandassociates.com

The website that it has come from is: http://www.thackraywilliams.com

The information that has been copied relates to our partners, and our What
